recommended_degree: Manajemen, Teknik Industri, Psikologi, Manajemen Administrasi, Hospitality dan Pariwisata (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
- Handle end-to-end recruitment processes, including job posting, screening, interviewing, and onboarding.
- Manage HR administration such as contracts, attendance, employee data, and documentation.
- Assist in organizing and delivering training programs and employee development activities.
- Support HR events and engagement initiatives (celebrations, CSR, team-building, etc.).
- Coordinate with department heads to address staffing needs and employee inquiries.
- Ensure HR processes follow company policies and compliance requirements.
